# NSManagedObjectContextConcurrencyType.confinementConcurrencyType

**Case**

Specifies that the context will use the thread confinement pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
case confinementConcurrencyType
```

## Concurrency Types

- **NSManagedObjectContextConcurrencyType.privateQueueConcurrencyType**: Specifies that the context will be associated with a private dispatch queue.
- **NSManagedObjectContextConcurrencyType.mainQueueConcurrencyType**: Specifies that the context will be associated with the main queue.
